lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic will play the opening match against Aleksandr Nedovyesov on Friday when Serbia takes on Kazakhstan in the first round of the Davis Cup.
snippet: Novak Djokovic will play the opening match against Aleksandr Nedovyesov on Friday when Serbia takes on Kazakhstan in the first round of the Davis Cup....

headline.main: Djokovic to Open for Serbia Against Kazakhstan
headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Open for Serbia Against Kazakhstan
